item.title: It’s not just about the code: a lesson in product vision from DubHacks 2020.
item.author: Author
item.description: The funny thing is, when I was choosing my major, my father told me studying vanilla computer science would be insufficient in the long run for my career. It’s not just about the ability to solve a problem, or randomly blowing out techniques and technologies when solving humankind’s problems; he apprised me to have a vision about what problems that I wanted to solve, how to solve them, and most importantly, how and whom it would help.
